## About this Site

This website was created using R tidyverse, p8105.datasets, viridis, knitr, and flexdashboard packages. The website is hosted on github. The source code can be found at [My Github Page](https://github.com/agrantal/hw4_ag3911.github.io) 

Check out [Visualization](flexdashboard.html) to see my data visualizations.  


## About the Author 

Amelia Grant-Alfieri is a second-year MPH student at Columbia University studying environmental health science. Currently, she is learning R in her Data Science class and is excited to apply it to her future research. 

Before coming to Columbia, she: 

* attended Brown University, where she studied Visual Art, Cognition, and Neuroscience
* played a lot of soccer and Ultimate frisbee
* taught Biology to seventh- and ninth-graders in Washington, D.C.
